original_query: SELECT MIN(p.Id) FROM posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=13 AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=5 AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-13 09:20:10' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-09 10:24:35' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Views>=0 AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-04 16:59:53' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-07-22 15:15:22' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 13
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.Id=E2.RelatedPostId)

CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views >= 0 AND users.DownVotes >= 0 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-04 16:59:53' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-07-22 15:15:22')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1E2.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 5 AND postHistory.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-13 09:20:10'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2E6.OwnerUserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-09 10:24:35'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E3E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E6E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E2E6E3.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E3E5E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2E6E3E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E2E6E3E5.OwnerUserId=E4.UserId)
